data.communities:
None now, but maybe will open in http://spacetag.jp/ or
    http://kokogiko.net/
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
It looks that there are no root namespace for the modules which
    handle location-based data. "Geo" is likeky, but it sounds very
    academic, philosophical or commercial use of location. We want to
    make modules for more casual use of location, like, get location
    data from handy phone, post a location-based entry to moblog, or so
    on. If you don't think so, I'm ready to use "Geo" for root
    namespace, but it feel different for me.
